attributes.action: Hold a new referendum for the UK to stay in or leave the EU
attributes.additional_details:
We are deeply concerned about alleged Leave campaign overspending and unscrupulous misuse of social media  
Voters have been willfully manipulated: it is necessary to hold a second referendum to preserve the integrity of our democratic institutions and to offer a real choice about the future of the UK.

https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2017/may/07/the-great-british-brexit-robbery-hijacked-democracy

https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2018/mar/27/beleave-revelations-taint-brexit-result-shahmir-sanni-disclosure-funds
attributes.background: In light of the revelations by whistle-blowers Chris Wylie and Shahmir Sanni (Cambridge Analytica and BeLeave), we think that the outcome of the Referendum would have been different had this unethical and potentially illegal interference in the democratic process not occurred.
